site_name: Central Middlesex Hospital, Acton Lane, London, NW10 7NS
description: Non-material amendment (branding and fenestration) of Non-material amendments reference 16/2030 dated 13 June, 2016, for Non material amendment (Erection of shop front to enclose retail shell/units) of full application reference 10/2164 dated 25/08/2010 for Erection of 3 linked buildings for mixed-use development on land next to Central Middlesex Hospital, to provide 891mý of retail/food & drink (Use Class A1 or A3) and 17,842mý of care & treatment or secure hospital floorspace (Use Class C2/C2A - residential institutions or secure residential institutions), with formation of refuse storage, loading bay, cycle storage, car-parking and associated landscaping and subject to a Deed of Agreement dated 25th November 2010 under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended
